data.lyric:
[ti:Southbound]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Southbound - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:02.27]Producer：David Garcia/Carrie Underwood
[00:04.55]We got a pontoon boat with a Yamaha
[00:07.32]People dressed like they're in Panama
[00:09.94]Small town spring break
[00:11.51]Every weekend 'round this place
[00:14.13]And there's a bunch of boys trying to catch the eyes
[00:16.56]Of all the pretty girls that are walking by
[00:18.93]And those redneck margaritas are 2 for 1 at that old marina
[00:24.61]Tan lines and gas station cheap sunglasses
[00:29.23]We're coming here for one more round
[00:32.88]To get a little southbound unwound
[00:35.96]Tennessee Honey kinda buzz
[00:38.05]Then south sounds up loud summer drippin' over us
[00:42.89]Wanna give a bang to the party cove
[00:45.40]Long as it floats we'll rock the boat
[00:47.81]And it's all lookin' up when we get down yeah
[00:51.95]And get a little southbound southbound
[00:56.82]Get a little southbound southbound
[01:02.21]Moe got a ticket and our old wigs on
[01:04.38]But Katie's the one that should take it slow
[01:06.91]'Cause she's dancin' on the dock
[01:08.78]And it's only two o'clock
[01:11.19]Yeah the fish ain't bitin' 'cause the party's on
[01:13.80]The old men are thinkin' 'bout goin' home
[01:16.10]But those redneck margaritas are two for one at that old marina yeah
[01:22.75]We're gonna get a little southbound unwound
[01:26.08]Tennessee Honey kinda buzz
[01:28.32]Then south sounds up loud summer drippin' over us
[01:33.13]Wanna give a bang to the party cove
[01:35.56]Long as it floats we'll rock the boat
[01:38.00]And it's all lookin' up when we get down yeah
[01:42.22]And get a little southbound southbound
[01:46.96]Get a little southbound southbound
[01:52.00]Oh yeah
[02:01.07]Yeah we got the roof swing swingin' like a chandelier
[02:04.24]Little bit of heaven on the water ride here
[02:06.58]Don't need much just a couple of beers and you and me
[02:09.99]Gotta love this time of year
[02:15.39]Getting southbound southbound
[02:20.06]So let's get a little southbound unwound
[02:23.42]Tennessee Honey kinda buzz
[02:25.53]Then south sounds up loud summer drippin' over us
[02:30.43]Wanna give a bang to the party cove
[02:32.78]Long as it floats we'll rock the boat
[02:35.24]And it's all lookin' up when we get down yeah
[02:39.38]And get a little southbound southbound
[02:44.26]Get a little southbound southbound
[02:48.67]Let's get a little southbound southbound
[02:53.70]Get a little southbound southbound
[02:58.75]Oh yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Southbound]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.27]//
[00:04.55]我们有一艘平底船 装了雅马哈的船外机
[00:07.32]人们穿着清凉 好像他们在巴拿马
[00:09.94]小镇 春假
[00:11.51]每个周末都来这个地方
[00:14.13]有一群男孩使出浑身解数
[00:16.56]想要博得路过的漂亮姑娘的目光
[00:18.93]在那个老船坞 玛格丽塔酒买一送一
[00:24.61]晒黑的皮肤 加油站廉价的太阳镜
[00:29.23]我们又一次来到这里
[00:32.88]扬帆起航 向南行进
[00:35.96]感受一下田纳西的热闹
[00:38.05]南方真热闹 我们感受到了夏天热烈的氛围
[00:42.89]想要去参加海湾的派对
[00:45.40]只能船能到达的地方 我们就会嗨翻全场
[00:47.81]当我们到达的时候 气氛高涨
[00:51.95]向南行进 向南行进
[00:56.82]向南行进 向南行进
[01:02.21]Moe搞到了门票 我们收拾好行装
[01:04.38]但Katie这个人应该悠着点
[01:06.91]因为她竟然在甲板上跳舞
[01:08.78]现在才两点呢
[01:11.19]鱼不上钩 因为派对太热闹
[01:13.80]年纪大了的人有点想回家
[01:16.10]但在那个老船坞 玛格丽塔酒是买一送一的诶
[01:22.75]我们要扬帆起航 向南行进
[01:26.08]感受一下田纳西的热闹
[01:28.32]南方真热闹 我们感受到了夏天热烈的氛围
[01:33.13]想要去参加海湾的派对
[01:35.56]只能船能到达的地方 我们就会嗨翻全场
[01:38.00]当我们到达的时候 气氛高涨
[01:42.22]向南行进 向南行进
[01:46.96]向南行进 向南行进
[01:52.00]//
[02:01.07]我们肆意狂欢 让船顶像吊灯一样摇晃
[02:04.24]在水上狂欢 竟有一种置身天堂的感觉
[02:06.58]需要的不多 只要有几瓶啤酒 还有你和我
[02:09.99]好喜欢每年的这个时候
[02:15.39]向南行进 向南行进
[02:20.06]所以 让我们扬帆起航 向南行进
[02:23.42]感受一下田纳西的热闹
[02:25.53]南方真热闹 我们感受到了夏天热烈的氛围
[02:30.43]想要去参加海湾的派对
[02:32.78]只能船能到达的地方 我们就会嗨翻全场
[02:35.24]当我们到达的时候 气氛高涨
[02:39.38]向南行进 向南行进
[02:44.26]向南行进 向南行进
[02:48.67]让我们向南行进
[02:53.70]向南行进 向南行进
[02:58.75]//
